website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced, well-made option. Solid cable construction and easy to assemble.
pros: Works well at low heights and inclines
Generous weight limit for child and adult use
cons: Some users report tension adjustment is difficult
Maximum weight limit of 250 pounds questionable

customer_reviews.title: I bought this particular zipline because of the great reviews. My 5 grandchildren (ages 4- 11) are ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this particular zipline because of the great reviews. My 5 grandchildren (ages 4- 11) are having so much fun with it! Great purchase! It is sturdy and durable, very safe and easy to use. One of my son's was able to get it set up between 2 very sturdy trees and it holds up well! The kids are really enjoying themselves and also are getting out doors, instead of staying inside watching tv or on the iPads!
customer_reviews.author: Lou F.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it. Before you buy it make sure you ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Before you buy it make sure you have 2-12 inch diameter trees at the proper distance from each other. Well at least 12. I did not and had to build something under my deck to make it work. It's lots of fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jones

customer_reviews.title: Shouts of delight
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to tell when kids are playing on it, I hear shouts of delight. This is so much fun for the kids. Very easy to assemble. It was missing the torque wrench, but after one email, the company had the replacement part shipped and to my house within 2 days. Great for backyards.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves this! One of my best purchaes ever. It took some time to get the line set just right but we were up for the challenge and it was well worth the time and effort. The grandkids all loved it and rode on it for hours. We even attached a Little Tikes baby swing to it so the babies could ride. Now I want to add a second one!
customer_reviews.author: tylioromiosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Took me about 30-45 minutes. Nice that the cables have rubber covers to protect the tree. I'm 190 lbs. and it holds me fine on a 50ft run. I put the cable through 24 inches of springs a s a brake rather than buy a $70 spring brake. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: April Morris

customer_reviews.title: kids favorite outdoor activity
customer_reviews.text: works as expected. only thing wrong is the directions mention a sort of stopper device that isn't included. i ended up rigging my own as well as alternate solution to protect tree. the kids love this and it works well besides that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Luevano

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it. We bought as activity for a backyard ...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it. We bought as activity for a backyard bbq and it was the biggest hit with all the kids. We used for 5 yr olds and they were totally fine on it but just needed a little help getting on it. Set up was reasonable, the hardest part was getting line tight enough.
customer_reviews.author: sayo

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun! Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun! Kids love it. Mine was missing instructions but I found them online. Install was a little challenging to get it taunt but once it is up it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Iolene

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Very Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This zip line was easy to install and very secure. The seat that is included, is durable and easy to attach. It provides hours of entertainment for small and bigs kids!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Milford

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun, easy to setup! Kids play for hours on this thing. Only minor draw back is I think the bearings on the trolley are not as smooth as it could be. But that's OK, it's a good price for a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it. We had to stop using ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it. We had to stop using the seat because it is a hard stop and he kept bumping his head.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: takes some knowledge from skilled carpenter for base take off platform!!!
customer_reviews.author: db55155

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Nephews and all neighborhood kids LOVE this Zipline
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Nephews and all neighborhood kids LOVE this Zipline. Doesn't have to be high or extra long, works just fine in average backyard. Nephews are the cool kids with this backyard play item.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up with good instructions. Works great - kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: LED

customer_reviews.title: FUN, FUN, FUN!
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect and exactly what we wanted. It was delivered in late June and it’s now 30 days later and we’ve had HOURS OF FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun
customer_reviews.text: the kids love this. Had an issue in the beginning where it would snap at the end. The seller immediately replaced it. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fun!! Kids and adults had a blast with this. Easy to set up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: FF

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, put it up for 6&9 yrs old for Christmas, can't wait to see their faces Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Silent Assasin

customer_reviews.title: my son said it was easy to put up in very little time
customer_reviews.text: So far children are loving it ... my son said it was easy to put up in very little time
customer_reviews.author: Pamela F. McDavid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday present for my granddaughter! she absolutely loves it! Combs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and over the moon!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two younger siblings for Christmas and they loved it!! I love that this has a seat, and everything to set it up in the backyard. Thrilled and surprised with the quality:)
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: and our granddaughters (ages four through nine) love it.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, and our granddaughters (ages four through nine) love it.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES URBAN

customer_reviews.title: All in one kit, clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: I like that this kit has everything you need with very clear instructions. One tip is that before you fix the line in place, pull it as tight as you possibly can. We thought we did, but then when you turn the tensioner you will find there is more slack than you think, and the tensioner will only make it so much tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap Charlie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Details said it goes up to 250 lbs bit box says 150. Which is it?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Came with cable only! This was a big Christmas gift and now it's ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to install. Seems to be holding up well so far. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Ruined. Parts missing!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas was ruined! Went to install Christmas Day and the cable clamps were missing. Total let down, daughter in tears.
customer_reviews.author: M. Preston

customer_reviews.title: but product works great. Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Held up well so far. Wish the rollers were a little smother or maybe larger, but product works great. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A Kniegge

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it and it holds enough weight for a big ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what expected. Kids love it and it holds enough weight for a big adult.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Vreeland

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren and other children of friends have loved the Zipline
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren and other children of friends have loved the Zipline. They have had lots of fun every time they use it. No accidents or problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B. Parris

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will be great - it was given as ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it will be great - it was given as a gift and has yet to be "installed" since they need to clear some trees and the weather has not permitted...
customer_reviews.author: HDS

customer_reviews.title: Great product - A lot of FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product - extremely fun! Took my husband and father about 30 mins to install. Even bought a 5-pt harness swing for our 1-year-old to enjoy the ride! Great addition to our backyard! On top of that, excellent customer service - frequent and responsive to e-mail - which works great for me! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Di Zader

product_meta.title: Epic Series - 80' Zipline with Seat
product_meta.description: Turn your backyard into an adventure park! Most people agree that zipline kits are one of the most exciting items that you can put in your backyard for hours and hours of enjoyment. The ziplines help improve strength, athletic skills, and balance all while riding a just a few feet off the ground. There are less parts to assemble, which means our kit is easier and faster to set-up than others. Get started ziplining in 30 minutes. Very thorough instructions to help give you guidance on where, how to set up and riding details. Only tools needed are pliers and wrench. Two people suggested for set up! Trolley has sealed ball bearings that help maximize strength and speed. Trolley handles have exceptional grips for non -slip and easy comfort. Great fun for ages 7 and up! Maximum load is 200 lbs.
feature_bullets: Kit includes: 5 foot sling cable, 75 foot main cable, u-clamps, turnbuckle with nuts and bolts, trolley
Easy enough to set up in 30 minutes
